attributes.description: Our milk will be supplied exclusively by several local family-owned farms in Chenango County of upstate New York.  These farms are located within 15 miles of our yogurt co-packing facility, which is also a family owned business.  Our farmers do not use any growth hormones like rBGH.  The cows on these farms have names – not numbers – and are strictly grass fed.
attributes.title: Milk
